name: Loftie
0:
”Alexa open loftie and turn on my lamp.”
”Alexa open loftie and turn off my lamp.”
”Alexa open loftie and change my lamp brightness to three.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: loftie
des: Using the Loftie skill you can easily control the power of the your lamps. You can also control the brightness, brightness levels range from 1 to 5.
